summary:
Petrophysicist with broad experience in conventional and unconventional projects. Worked in a variety projects in offshore (Deepwater Norwegian Sea and Irish Sea) and onshore environments. Involved in projects at different life–cycle phases including exploration, appraisal and development.  

Experienced both in operational and study petrophysics. Involved in static and dynamic modeling, volumetric update, reserve reporting, uncertainty study, rock physics projects. Experience in planning and execution of coring, LWD, WL, pipe-conveyed logging, formation sampling and testing operations. Expertise in coring, routine and special core analysis.

Experienced working in multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary teams. Self-motivated professional with ability to multi-task and prioritize the work. Always focused on fit for purpose timely delivery of results and able to deliver through others. Flexible in working under stressful conditions. Good coaching skills.  Keen to broaden technical skills as well as leadership and integration skills.

profile_positions.description:
• Petrophysicist in Emerging Ventures and Growth teams
• Petrophysical support for frontier exploration Unconventional projects 
• Prepared Shell global guideline for coring and core handling in Unconventional reservoirs
• Round Robin study for crushed core analysis performed by different commercial laboratories
• Coaching junior staff
profile_positions.title: Senior Petrophysicist

profile_positions.description:
• Asset petrophysicist for Gundy Montney tight gas project
• Planning and execution of data gathering for shale gas project appraisal campaign (20 wells) including coring operations, wireline  and pipe-conveyed logging
• Designing core analysis program for tight gas and tight oil reservoirs
• Regional Petrophysical study for Montney formation incorporating log and core data for 450+ wells
• Evaluation of several exploration prospects including building petrophysical model and assessing associated uncertainties
• Integrating petrophysical data with various geosciences disciplines
• Petrophysical input in pilot projects and implementation 
• Petrophysical support for land sales and reserves reporting
• Experience using mineralogy, geochemistry and petrography for reservoir characterization 
• Familiar with probabilistic petrophysical methods such as ELAN
• Pore pressure prediction for exploration wells
• As core analysis focal point for Shell Canada monitoring execution and progress of core analysis and geochemistry projects (around 40-50 projects at any given time)
• Contract holder for several contracts with core analysis laboratories and coring vendors
• Development of  reporting standards for petrophyiscal report and core analysis program
• Coaching junior staff for coring and core analysis
profile_positions.title: Petrophysicist

profile_positions.description:
• Providing petrophysical input to multi-disciplinary projects, from frontier exploration through discovery appraisal, field development, production projects including  projects in Norwegian Sea and Irish Sea
• Operations and study Petrophysicist for Deepwater frontier exploration 
• Designing  and monitoring logging programs and conducting petrophysical evaluations of single wells and multi-well projects
• Planning, acquisition  and interpretation of pressure data and reservoirs fluids samples with MDT/XPT tools 
• Planning core operations including coring in poor consolidated sands
• Completing in-depth field studies incorporating logs, pressure data, core and special core analysis to yield a detailed field petrophysical evaluation
• Participated in multi-disciplinary uncertainties studies
• Provided technical input to new EWL contract for Shell Europe, Ensuring that learning and technical requirements are captured in new contracts to further optimize contract arrangement
• Experience in QI study (Geophysical logs QC and editing, invasion corrected logs, Gasmann substitution) 
• As core analysis focal point for Shell Europe designed several core analysis program  (CCA, SWC and SCAL programs including experience with unconsolidated core )
• Short assignment as a wellsite geologist and logging/coring operations witness
profile_positions.title: Petrophysicist

profile_positions.description:
• Taught Courses: Discrete Mathematics, Complex Analysis, Theory of Probability and Statistics, Functional Analysis
• Developed and graded assignments for several courses
• Prepared the curriculum for the Functional Analysis course
profile_positions.title: Member of teaching staff
